textBox.richText: I Am Cell, We Are Zeitgeist 10/13/08

Experiential: Derived from experience or the experience of existence; "the rich experiential content of the teachings of the older philosophers" - Benjamin Farrington; "formal logicians are not concerned with existential matters" - John Dewey Show link: http://kdvs.org/shows/view/show_id/552/date/2008-10-13/ Direct download: http://169.237.101.92/archives/2008-10-13_552_192kbps.mp3 New adds: Vampire Weekend - Vampire Weekend - XL Bodies of Water - A Certain Feeling - Secretly Canadian Twine - Violets - Ghostly International 10/13/08: Frankmusik: When You're Around (Boys Noize Remix) | myspace.com/boysnoize MSTRKRFT feat.
